recordset.NAME: Mac Computers
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple desktop and laptop computers including MacBook, iMac, Mac mini, Mac Studio, and Mac Pro. Professional and consumer computing solutions with macOS operating system.

recordset.NAME: iPhone
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple smartphone devices with iOS operating system. Complete range from iPhone SE to iPhone Pro Max with various storage capacities and color options.

recordset.NAME: iPad
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple tablet computers with iPadOS. Range includes iPad, iPad Air, iPad Pro, and iPad mini for creativity, productivity, and entertainment.

recordset.NAME: Apple Watch
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple smartwatch with health and fitness tracking, communication features, and app ecosystem. Available in multiple sizes, materials, and band options.

recordset.NAME: AirPods
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple wireless earbuds and headphones with advanced audio technology, noise cancellation, and seamless device integration.

recordset.NAME: Apple TV
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple digital media players and set-top boxes for streaming entertainment content with tvOS operating system and Siri Remote.

recordset.NAME: HomePod
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple smart speakers with high-fidelity audio, Siri voice assistant, and smart home integration capabilities.

recordset.NAME: Accessories
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple and third-party accessories including cases, chargers, cables, keyboards, mice, adapters, and protective gear for all Apple devices.

recordset.NAME: Software
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple software products including Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, Compressor, Motion, and educational software packages for creative professionals.

recordset.NAME: Services
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple services including AppleCare protection plans, technical support, device setup, personal training, and repair services.

recordset.NAME: Gift Cards
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple Store and App Store gift cards in various denominations for purchasing Apple products, apps, music, movies, and other digital content.

recordset.NAME: Pro Displays & Accessories
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Professional-grade displays including Pro Display XDR, Studio Display, and associated professional accessories for creative workflows.

recordset.NAME: Apple Vision Pro
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple mixed reality headset with spatial computing capabilities, immersive experiences, and advanced eye and hand tracking technology.

recordset.NAME: Refurbished Products
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple certified refurbished products including Mac, iPad, iPhone, Apple Watch, and accessories with full warranty and quality guarantee.

recordset.NAME: Education Products
recordset.DESCRIPTION: Apple products and bundles specifically designed for educational institutions including volume licensing, educational discounts, and classroom solutions.
